content:
The project activity generated renewable electricity without any GHG emissions, which displaced part of the electricity otherwise supplied by grid connected fossil fuel fired power plants. Thus, GHG emission reductions can be achieved.

Soubr√© hydropower project had a planned execution time of 56 months and was completed ahead of schedule by Sinohydro International EPC contractor, in May 2017 as per following progressive commissioning by turbo-generator group:

e G1: 25 may 2017

G2: 23 august 2017

G3: 25 october 2017

G4 (mini-plant): 28 november 2017

The commissioning date of each turbine has been verified during the remote interview/physical site visit and also from the supportive document /10/ and found consistent.

The project activity is operational since commissioning of first unit and during current monitoring period i.e. from 01/07/2022 - 30/06/2023, the project activity has supplied 1,509,806 MWh net electricity to the grid, there by resulted in emission reduction of 912,224 tCO02e. The monitoring period subject to this monitoring report is inclusive of first and last day of period.

Vv vcs

Verification Report: VCS Version 4.2
